description:
Bac Ha Software Co., Ltd. (BHSoft) is a dynamic and fast-moving company in software development and information technology in Vietnam. BHSoft is one of the subsidiaries of BHTech and focusing on software development services.
Established in 2014, BHSoft has been expanding services to world-wide clients from Europe, America, Singapore, Japan and other countries. BHSoft provides the optimum solution that always meets customers’ needs and applies latest technologies on customer’s projects to make it the best applications.
We are offering following services:
Offshore Development Center
Software Development
Product Development
GIS and Map Application
3D and BIM Application Development
Mobile Application Development
Our strong management, talent and experienced teams that have proven ourselves to be one of the top Software Development Companies of the market leaders. Being our client, you are always considered as our long-term partner and your business requirement will be carefully evaluated and applied with the best technologies that meet your demand.
At the moment, we are experienced with Objective-C/Swift,ReactJS/ React Native, Redis/Redux, GraphQL, C#/ASP.Net Core, JS/JQuery, TypeScript, AngularJS, NodeJS, HTML5/CSS3, Vue.JS, PHP/Laravel, MongoDB, MySQL/PostgreSQL. And familiar with GIS/Web Map View, Cesium, GeoServers, OpenLayers, PostGIS and Three.js, WebGL, 3D Visualization.
Furthermore, we are using all deployment platforms now like GCP, AWS, Azure, Heroku, Docker. We can apply CI/CD and Unit test into projects implementation.
